title: Basic Sweet Crêpes
directions: Whisk together eggs, milk, and lukewarm water in a large bowl.
Add flour and beat until smooth.
Mix in melted butter, sugar, and a pinch of salt.
Preheat a skillet to high heat.
Pour in 1/4 cup of batter and spread to a disk as thin as possible.
Cook until the edges start to brown, then flip.
